title: Vice President Biden to Host Blair House Meeting on Deficit Reduction | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Vice President


For Immediate Release
April 18, 2011

 



Vice President Biden to Host Blair House Meeting on Deficit Reduction





	On Thursday, May 5th, the Vice President will host a meeting on deficit reduction with Members of Congress at Blair House. In the Presidentâ€™s fiscal policy speech delivered last Wednesday, he announced that Vice President Biden will lead a bipartisan, bicameral group to begin work on a legislative framework for comprehensive deficit reduction. Additional details on the meeting will be forthcoming.
